name: All Types of Treatment By Specialised Doctors
description: Here you can get any type of treatment. From surgery to small treatments we provide you all with reasonable cost

name: 24 Hour Ambulance Service
description: We can provide you with ambulance throughout day and night.The ambulance is completely free of cost.

name: Emergency Care
description: We have emergency unit in which our doctors are always ready for emergency cases.

name: Chmeotherapy
description: We provide Chemotherapy to cancer patients at reasonable cost.

name: Morgue Service
description: We have morgue to freeze dead bodies at low cost

name: Home treatment and Oxygen Supply to Patients in Home
description: We also supply oxygen to home and also provide patients with treatments in home in case of such emergency that it is not possible for the patient to come outside. If it is possible for the patient to come outside home please don't use this service
